content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
No new structures have been successfully constructed on the map. Multiple recovery attempts were made to place a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs; however, all lab placement or crafting actions failed due to inventory shortages and unmet resource prerequisites. Although operations were performed at existing furnaces (one at (5.0, 5.0) for iron smelting and another at (–27.0, –60.0) for copper smelting), these were retrieved from the environment rather than created by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Incorrect API usage for entity retrieval
 – Using an unexpected keyword argument ('radius') led to a TypeError.
 – Passing positional arguments when none are expected resulted in another TypeError.
  Tip: Verify the function’s signature and supply only the supported parameters.

• Iteration over a None value
 – Attempting to iterate over the result of get_entities (when it returned None) caused a TypeError.
  Tip: Check if the returned entity list is valid (or default to an empty list) before iterating.

• Lab placement failures
 – Repeated errors occurred when trying to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), with messages indicating no lab in inventory.
  Tip: Ensure that the Lab has been successfully crafted and is present in inventory prior to attempting placement.

• Lab crafting errors due to missing ingredients
 – Several crafting attempts failed because required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) were missing or could not be produced.
  Tip: Verify that all resource prerequisites and intermediary crafting dependencies are met before initiating Lab crafting.
